item.title: In a Corda blockchain (R3 CEV), will the block be replicated on every member node of the private blockchain?
item.description:
In a Corda blockchain (R3 CEV), will the block be replicated on every member node of the private blockchain?

Wait, what? You won't "allow" it? Is this person your husband or your child? If you treat your husband like a child and believe you have the right to allow or not allow him to do what he wants, you are laying the groundwork for your future divorce.

item.title: The FBI Speaks Out Again About Encryption
item.description:
The FBI Speaks Out Again About Encryption

James Comey, Director of the FBI, is speaking out again. Issuing another warning on Tuesday about the bureau still not being able to get into encrypted devices. He says that widespread encryption that is being built into smartphones, is making the area they are in charge of investigating "dark".

item.title: How can superconnectors make use of blockchain/be rewarded by it?
item.description:
How can superconnectors make use of blockchain/be rewarded by it?

Answer: First thought: as a distributed and inherently public network of trust blockchain might be useful for memorializing social transactions, i.e. X did a favor for Y. Second thought: this could be monetized via the 21 (software platform) for microcommerce. More if I think of it.

item.title: German savers lose faith in banks
item.description:
German savers lose faith in banks

HAMBURG--German savers are leaving the security of savings banks for what many now consider an even safer place to park their cash: home safes. For years, Germans kept socking money away in savings accounts despite plunging interest rates. Savers deemed the accounts secure, and they still offered easy cash access.

item.title: Arlovski vs. Barnett: UFC Hamburg Bitcoin Betting Picks
item.description:
Arlovski vs. Barnett: UFC Hamburg Bitcoin Betting Picks

The UFC comes to Hamburg, Germany with former champions Andrei Arlovski and Josh Barnett facing off in a battle of MMA veterans. The fight card also features bouts with Nick Hein and Peter Sobotta. In the Women's Bantamweight division, Veronica Macedo makes her debut against Ashlee Evans-Smith, who is filling in for the injured Germaine de Randamie.

item.description:
